short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize links, articles, places, books or anything on the web into neat channels for personal or public use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Channelkit creates beautiful cards based on your content â€” links, files or notes. You can use preset categories of cards or create your own.

You than arrange your cards into channels. Each channel is private by default but can be published in your profile or shared via secret link.
